ref.mixed-citation:
Jurado KA
Yockey LJ
Wong PW
Antiviral CD8 T cells induce Zika-virus-associated paralysis in mice. Nat Microbiol 2018; 3: 141– 147. 29158604

note.p:
This work demonstrates that antiviral activity of CD8 T cells within the CNS greatly limits ZIKV infection of neurons but also instigates ZIKV-associated paralysis in Ifnar
-/- mice. Together with references 14 and 15, it revealed that both CD4 and CD8 T cells participate in the control of ZIKV infection.
